title: Warrant Obtained for Third Suspect in Old Fort Road Homicide Investigation
body:
Lenwood “Lenny” HarrisOn January 26, 2012, at
approximately 12:07 p.m., police received an anonymous call that a body was in
a well in the 11900 block of Old Fort Road. 
Patrol officers arrived on scene and established a crime scene.  With the assistance of the Prince George’s
County Fire Department, Department of Environmental Resources, the Department
of Public Works, the Health Department and the excavating company, “Dirt Plus”,
the body was recovered on Saturday, January 28, 2012.  The Medical Examiner’s Office positively identified the body on Sunday, January 29, 2012.Anyone with information about this case is
asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Homicide Unit at
(301) 772-4925.  Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime
Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to CRIMES
(274637) on your cell phone, or go to http://www.princegeorgescountymd.gov/police/ to submit a tip online.

Prince George's County Police
